thread.title: PM May says committed to ensuring Iran deal is upheld

title: PM May says committed to ensuring Iran deal is upheld
text:
May 13, 2018 / 6:11 PM / Updated an hour ago PM May says committed to ensuring Iran deal is upheld Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Britain and its European partners remain committed to ensuring the nuclear deal with Iran is upheld and Tehran must continue to meet its obligations under the pact, Prime Minister Theresa May told the Iranian president on Sunday. Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May in Barnet, London, Britain May 4, 2018. REUTERS/Toby Melville/Pool
“Both leaders agreed the importance of continued dialogue between the two countries, and looked forward to the meeting of UK, German, French and Iranian foreign ministers in Brussels on Tuesday,” according to a readout of the call with President Hassan Rouhani that was issued by May’s office. Reporting by Ismail Shakil in Bengaluru; Editing by Edmund Blair
